website_summaries.verdict: The Xerox DocuMate 152i is a budget desktop document scanner with solid speed and good optical-character-recognition (OCR) performance.
pros: Matched its rated speeds for simplex and duplex scanning to image PDF
cons: Scan profiles are identified on the scanner by number, not by name

customer_reviews.title: Great scanner, fast
customer_reviews.text: Great scanner, fast, double sided. The ONLY annoying thing is that it has 1 pinch wheel in the middle and this can make pages scan out of line even the pages are set correctly between the guides. The Guides can’t fixed and are too easy to move themselves out of line too. Quality of the scan is great
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Best scanner
customer_reviews.text: Excellent scanner and very fast. Great value for money. I have to scan clients' documents and saves me a lot of time. The set up disk and associated programs are a bonus.
customer_reviews.author: Brian A Meiklejohn

customer_reviews.title: Two Stars
customer_reviews.text: Very fast scanner but It keeps giving problems- may need to exchange it!
customer_reviews.author: Wymer

customer_reviews.title: It holds about 30 pages in document feeder and it ...
customer_reviews.text: It holds about 30 pages in document feeder and it does not scan straight so scanned docs do not look professional. In case of paper jam, it just stops scanning and you cannot continue scanning into the same file after paper jam is cleared. You need to either rescan everything or scan the rest of the docs into a new file.
customer_reviews.author: Iana Z

customer_reviews.title: Excellent heavy duty scanner
customer_reviews.text: Excellent scanner. You don't know how good it is until you depend on it for everyday use. I had to go through several cheap scanners before I finally cracked open my wallet and bought this. The best way to describe it is that it is heavy duty. Probably will last a decade.
customer_reviews.author: Matthew D. Ruffell

customer_reviews.title: Long Lasting / easy to use
customer_reviews.text: I own two of these scanners. The first one I bought almost 15 years ago and has seen heavy use, but still works perfectly. Subsequently, I needed a second scanner bought a similar model from a different brand. It lasted about 2 years. So I went back and bought another Xerox 152 and I now have 2 in service for a long time. My only complaint is that I can't get the Simplex/Dupex Buttons on the scanner to work with the most recent version of Windows 10. Still easy to use scanner from desktop, though.
customer_reviews.author: Scott

customer_reviews.title: Jams or fails to feed consistently.
customer_reviews.text: This scanner often jams or fails to catch papers in the feed. It is very frustrating. Must constantly be present to "tap" pages to encourage them to go through. This is consistent regardless of paper types, sizes or size of job. Otherwise quality of scans and versatility of software included is acceptable.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Dream Scanner!
customer_reviews.text: This scanner is a dream! I scanned paperwork stored up for over a year, 30+ family artbooks, 12 years of school annuals, and a ton of pictures over the course of just a couple of weeks and it rarely even got an error or scanned things at an angle, even though there were a lot of uneven pages in what I scanned. I couldn’t ask for a better scanner. It is worth every penny of the price.
customer_reviews.author: SL

customer_reviews.title: POS
customer_reviews.text: This product was absolute garbage. I went Office Space on it and smashed it into pieces. It wasted hours of our time--the paper won't feed properly and it gives nonsensical error codes. It worked well for maybe a month and then gave us problems all the way until I smashed it into pieces because it was such a piece of garbage. Save yourself the headache and money and just buy a better one. Don't make the same mistake we did--skip this garbage.
customer_reviews.author: richard

customer_reviews.title: Super Scanner
customer_reviews.text: This little scanner is a bargain at the price! It is easy to set up and easy to use. Scans quickly; and the scans are clear and beautiful; It is a little workhorse. I have been using mine for years now, and bought this one for my husband's office, mostly because of ease of use (this means I don't have to go in and fix it for him multiple times a day!). It is a great buy, and I would highly recommend it.
customer_reviews.author: Webbie A. Carvajal

customer_reviews.title: Crooked, skewed, wonky scans every time
customer_reviews.text: Agreeing with several other reviewers. I was in a pinch and didn't have time to return it 8 months ago when I bought it. Did a big document scan and threw it into the store room. Every page was crooked this way or that. How could they release a document scanner that can't feed paper straight? In the 2020 shelter-in-place pandemic, I brought it home to maybe use to scan some photos. Same thing. Not slightly off. WAY OFF in how crooked the scanned images are. Now looking for a viable, reliable replacement.
customer_reviews.author: Handy Bob

customer_reviews.title: Excellent desktop document scanner
customer_reviews.text: This scanner is super-fast and quite simple to use. Duplex scanning is included, which is a nice feature to have for double-sided scans. Unboxing and set up was quite simple - up and running in just a few minutes. All the accessories you'll need are included, including the USB cable for hooking up to your computer. There is a software DVD, but you can download any drivers and software you need online, as well. A very small footprint is a welcome addition to my cluttered desk! So far, the scans have been flawless, highly recommended!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: A+
customer_reviews.text: WE HAVE 3 of these scanners at work and they work like a charm, for the most part... but on occasion, I have to unplug the connection to the computer to "reset it's brains" if you will LOL, and it'll re-connect... Medium paced speed, great black and white color though.. and we've done 100,000+ scans already... still works great...
customer_reviews.author: #LiveAloha

customer_reviews.title: Great scanner at a reasonable price
customer_reviews.text: My office has four Xerox Documate 152i scanners and have been using them for several years. Everyone loves them. They get fairly heavy use and we have never had any problems. We needed another scanner so bought the 152i I strongly recommend the 152i to anyone looking for scanner.
customer_reviews.author: Ray E

customer_reviews.title: Bad
customer_reviews.text: Started putting black lines on paper within a week of using it.
customer_reviews.author: Annette M.

customer_reviews.title: great for organizing paperwork
customer_reviews.text: My office prepare 1 scanner for each team member that they need to scan all paperwork and upload to Dropbox. This scanner is small footage and scan speed is good at the price range. It's a good balance for our small business. We are happy with the performance so far!!!
customer_reviews.author: Loyal Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great Scanner!!
customer_reviews.text: I was looking for a scanner for my girlfriend. She is an appraiser and desperately needs to copy her files and save them digitally. This scanner caught my eye because of the great footprint, overall capacity, and speed. We really like this scanner. The business card reader software has been a pleasant surprise. The included software was easy to use and overall, I am very happy with this purchase. I would definitely recommend it.
customer_reviews.author: Eric Kramling

customer_reviews.title: Works like the other 3
customer_reviews.text: These 152i's run well for place I work. Some days heavy duty scanning, some days nothing. They seem to be lasting at least a couple years for us.
customer_reviews.author: Spoot

customer_reviews.title: Junk. What's the point of having a document feeder ...
customer_reviews.text: Junk. What's the point of having a document feeder that you have to tap the top of the pages so that they feed into the scanner properly? Constant paper jams. Such a frustrating unit to use. I'm purchasing something else because this unit requires too much time and effort on my part to execute proper scanning.
customer_reviews.author: Frank

customer_reviews.title: Not sure it is great  :O(
customer_reviews.text: It works and seems to scan nicely, however; not really fast, and every time I scan a page it gives an error and I have to turn it on and off before can scan something else.
customer_reviews.author: D. House

customer_reviews.title: Very Quick in Scanning
customer_reviews.text: I recently bought this for handling legal documents. This is very reliable and scans very quickly. I recommend this scanner highly. Excellent telephone support. However, the CD that came with it was outdated because the scanner was more up to date. It was an easy fix. I contacted their rep and he took control of my computer and was able to install the correct software and provide all kind of support after that how to use scanner. It was well worth the cost!!!!
customer_reviews.author: R. Lynne Martin

customer_reviews.title: Great durable scanner for working from home
customer_reviews.text: Ordered this scanner now that most of us are having to work from home due to Covid 19. Was easy to setup and use. I frequently have to scan documents to email to others for work. This is exactly what I needed to work from home!
customer_reviews.author: AL

customer_reviews.title: Unusable after 8 months
customer_reviews.text: Scanner was glitchy from the beginning, quality of the scans was poor and paper does not track well thru the machine. Do not buy this one!
customer_reviews.author: Monica Ford

customer_reviews.title: Very fast scanner.
customer_reviews.text: I like the speed of the scanner but I wish it was more user friendly on the software end
customer_reviews.author: Gavin P.

customer_reviews.title: Not as good as ScanSnap
customer_reviews.text: Scans crooked, and scan quality settings are difficult to manage. If you are looking to replace a ScanSnap, I do not recommend this unit.recommend spending the extra on the ScanSnap
customer_reviews.author: Darrin  S

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: This printer is great. It solve all incompatible issue that I am having with similar Epson product.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Compact and efficient
customer_reviews.text: Perfect for our new WFH set up. Takes up very little space and is quick and efficient!
customer_reviews.author: PN

customer_reviews.title: Great desktop scanner for small business
customer_reviews.text: Had the older version for years (152). This works just the same but boots quicker
customer_reviews.author: J. Broussard

customer_reviews.title: Great Product. Great features.
customer_reviews.text: Great product. Duplex and Multiple page abilities help with productivity. Scan is quick and easy. Delivered as advertised.
customer_reviews.author: Ed

customer_reviews.title: Good, but not great! I would buy a Fujitsu if it was close to the same price!
customer_reviews.text: Better than the old 152 but not sure it is better than a Fujitsu.
customer_reviews.author: Jeff

customer_reviews.title: Great little machine
customer_reviews.text: Great little machine. Took a while to learn the correct placing of paper, but once I did, the machine worked fantastic. It really has been able to reduce clutter, and I save the documents to a drop box location where several people have access. I would recommend this machine with no hesitation.
customer_reviews.author: Gregory Plata

customer_reviews.title: copy quality is HORRIBLE!
customer_reviews.text: it is super easy to use, but the quality of the scan is HORRIBLE!! My customer I scanned to couldn't even use the scan. I wouldn't waste my money.
customer_reviews.author: Kristi Sedita

customer_reviews.title: Excellent Scanner
customer_reviews.text: Bought this scanner to keep track of receipts for my new boutique. Arrived on time. Scans different size receipts into a folder on my desktop. Very satisfied!!
customer_reviews.author: janet fantazia

customer_reviews.title: Useful purchase
customer_reviews.text: Simple design, compact, easy to use software so far. Fast scanning. Paper has to be flat and straight for it to scan straight.
customer_reviews.author: Opfwd

customer_reviews.title: I hate the software provided
customer_reviews.text: I am trying to scan in mail. This does very poorly with folded paper. It does scan very quickly. I hate the software provided. The buttons work 50% of the time.
customer_reviews.author: conpaso

customer_reviews.title: Works well, but watch for Mac compatibility.
customer_reviews.text: Just after I got it, they had an issue with the driver not being compatible with the newest Mac OS. Customer support was responsive, and resolved the problem within a few days. However, updating the driver did require them mailing a CD with the new software. Since the software is not available for download, it was a bit frustrating since not all our Macs have CD drives. That being said, when it is working, it works very well. Fast duplex scanning in color or black and white. Document feeder handles a wide variety of papers, from thin notebook paper to folded copy paper to photographs. Overall, we are happy with the purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Moon mama

customer_reviews.title: Excellent scanner!
customer_reviews.text: This works simply amazing. It doesn't jam, and it powers through documents. So much better than the last one we had in our office.
customer_reviews.author: Rjay4Real

customer_reviews.title: It is very durable and the gears and motor sounds sturdy as well when in operation
customer_reviews.text: This scanner is the one you should buy. It is very durable and the gears and motor sounds sturdy as well when in operation.
customer_reviews.author: Jason

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Worked perfectly but a bit slow in scanning. Does the job!
customer_reviews.author: Bill C

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Works great and handles multiple documents. Even straightens out the crooked ones.
customer_reviews.author: Bomba

customer_reviews.title: Simple installation. Fast and efficient. Product support A+ ...
customer_reviews.text: Simple installation. Fast and efficient. Product support A+ as well - I've ordered about 10 of these, one died within days (power issue) and Xerox sent a no-hassle cross ship RMA very quickly.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Mac Software Not Updated by Xerox
customer_reviews.text: Mac users: Xerox has not updated software to latest iOS versions.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: This is great stuff. Easy installation and easy to work with
customer_reviews.author: Kenny

customer_reviews.title: EFFECIENT AND DURABLE!!
customer_reviews.text: Great for every growing business, a must for your office!!:)
customer_reviews.author: M.

customer_reviews.title: Great Product
customer_reviews.text: Took a few days to finally get up and running because I was using MAC OSX but tech support did a remote call with me and installed the software. Product works great and scans fast.
customer_reviews.author: P. Lewis

customer_reviews.title: Like an office in my....office
customer_reviews.text: This scanner does it all! What do you need? -Hold up to 50 pages in document feeder? Check -Able to scan up to 2,500 pages a day? Check -Scan 25 double sided documents in one minute at 300 dpi? Check -Paper feeding mechanism and LED lamps? Check -Create searchable PDF files in one step with included software bundle? Check Hit One-Click NOW!
customer_reviews.author: Azon_ADHD

customer_reviews.title: Excellent
customer_reviews.text: This machine is excellent! I used a 3 in 1 printer to scan documents in before. No comparison with the old printer. Good price also.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: would recommend.
customer_reviews.text: I bought one when I opened my business, and it worked so well I got a second one 7 months later when business picked up. would recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Mr Pibb

customer_reviews.title: Fast & Reliable
customer_reviews.text: Easy to use. Handles all scanning for a 2 doctor medical practice. Cut the time to scan medical documents in half.
customer_reviews.author: William Sargeant

customer_reviews.title: It just works...and its fast.
customer_reviews.text: It just works... you can put your pages in upside down, or right side up and the thing just scans it and OCR's it and puts it right side up for you. It's crazy fast for being so small.
customer_reviews.author: Wade Wright

customer_reviews.title: Software is finicky. Machine appears to work well mechanically ...
customer_reviews.text: Software is finicky. Machine appears to work well mechanically but the software interface is hit and miss. I am a mac user.
customer_reviews.author: DKD

customer_reviews.title: I'm really disappointed that I can't use it with my Mac because ...
customer_reviews.text: it's quick and works well with my PC. I have 4 for my office and my staff have not had a problem with the machine. After about a year or two, the paper does jam but can be fixed by wiping down the rollers. I finally had to replace one after about 3 years. We use them constantly throughout the day. I'm really disappointed that I can't use it with my Mac because the software for Macs is ridiculous. I have not gotten one for home use for that reason.
customer_reviews.author: dlee

customer_reviews.title: Works great
customer_reviews.text: Had to disable my security to load the software, other than that works fine and scans fast.
customer_reviews.author: William Harrington

customer_reviews.title: Two Stars
customer_reviews.text: Colors are terrible. A black and white scan produces only outlines!
customer_reviews.author: Diane U. Cash

customer_reviews.title: Heavy duty work horse..
customer_reviews.text: I have been using these scanners for years. I would say this scanner is a heavy duty work horse.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Scans an entire pile of papers very fast and very user friendly!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Very fast and doesn't skip a beat
customer_reviews.text: Generally--very fast and doesn't skip a beat (no errors miss pulls or skipped pages). The only slight negative is that it pulls pages so quickly that they are all indexed slightly crooked. Outside of that--it is a very easy and accurate scanner to use.
customer_reviews.author: MOE

customer_reviews.title: Software is messing up my PC
customer_reviews.text: I hate this scanner. The software has done nothing but mess up my computer. I wish I had returned it when I could.
customer_reviews.author: Carolyn

customer_reviews.title: The driver was not available on line or on the ...
customer_reviews.text: The driver was not available on line or on the disk supplied. I had to by a disk drive and have the help desk send me a new disk with the driver.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

product_meta.title: Xerox DocuMate 152i - USB 600 dpi colour document scanner, 2- sided ADF, 25 ppm for MAC or PC
product_meta.description:
Style Name:40 PPMThe new and improved Xerox DocuMate 152i may look like its award-winning predecessor, but this small scanner has been overhauled with new features. A complete small-office document management solution, the DocuMate 152i is 40% faster and includes robust PC and Mac TWAIN drivers and software. The Xerox DocuMate 152i, colour sheetfed document scanner, now scans up to 50 images per minute (ipm) in duplex mode, includes a 50-page automatic document feeder and has the ability to automatically scan documents into searchable PDF files. The scanner also offers a more powerful suite of bundled software designed to help you organise and find the information important to you. It’s easy to say that “you want to do more with the paper on your desk.” The hard part is finding the right tool to help you achieve that goal. Well-known for quick and easy scanning setup and operation, the Xerox DocuMate 152i is designed for small businesses, home offices and students who are looking for an easy-to-use scanner that includes all the tools needed to declutter their paper filled lives. Powered by Visioneer OneTouch technology, the scanner allows users to scan to the “destination” of their choice by pressing a single button, eliminating multiple steps usually required to save scanned documents in popular file formats. Visioneer OneTouch allows you to scan documents to your choice of 9 preset yet completely user configurable destinations. This enables your documents to be scanned with the correct settings for resolution, colour, cropping, file format and then delivered to virtually any application, folder or device – all at the touch of a button. The DocuMate 152i produces clear and sharp scans of any document, in colour or black and white. Worried that your highlighted notes from the meeting won’t scan clearly? What about the receipt that was folded in your pocket? Real world documents are never a problem for the DocuMate 152i. Visioneer Acuity technology enables the scanner to instantly improve the visual clarity of every scanned image. You get perfect scans from imperfect originals.

LEGAL DISCLAIMER
Product is sourced and shipped from the European Economic Area (EEA). Product is genuine original from manufacturer authorized distributors.
feature_bullets: Small desktop scanner holds up to 50 pages in document feeder
Able to scan up to 2,500 pages a day
Scans 25 double sided documents in one minute at 300 dpi
New and improved paper feeding mechanism and LED lamps
Creates searchable PDF files in one step with included software bundle
